mapper.insert: insert into tbl_point(pno, userid, point, p_code) values(seq_point_pno.nextval, #{userid}, #{point}, #{p_code})
mapper.select: select pno, userid, point, p.p_code, p_regdate, p_desc from tbl_point p, tbl_point_code c where p.p_code = c.p_code and userid = #{userid}
select nvl(sum(point), 0) from tbl_point where userid = #{userid}
